#summary OgreKit Lua bindings

== Notes ==

OgreKit uses SWIG to generate bindings from a c++ wrapper interface.

The most up to date documentation on this interface may be download here ([http://gamekit.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Docs/LuaAPI/local/OgreKitLua.zip HTML] | [http://gamekit.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Docs/LuaAPI/local/OgreKitLuaHTMLHelp.zip CHM])
